scripts.start: npm run init-project && wp-env start && bash .scripts/mailhog start
scripts.start:debug: npm run init-project && wp-env start --xdebug=develop,coverage,debug && bash .scripts/mailhog start
scripts.activate-plugin: wp-env run cli --env-cwd=wp-content/plugins/testowanie-wordpressa wp plugin activate testowanie-wordpressa
scripts.after-start: npm run composer install && npm run activate-plugin
